Areas to Click on:

  • 111 Building (black building with a white top or 'crown'
  • The City Creek center next to Temple Square
  • The Temple Square
  • The Church Office Building above Temple Square
  • Lone Peak (the rightmost mountain peak)
  • Cotton Wood canyon (the center mountain peak)
  • West High School (the sport field on the bottom and the building by it.)
  • Residential area. (The houses on the leftmost side)
  • Park City (the leftmost area between the mountains)
